description: Try our easy to follow Lucio and Lillian's Christmas Turkey recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Lucio and Lillian's Christmas Turkey Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: If the turkey is frozen defrost the turkey in your fridge for 24 hours before beginning this recipe.
Wash the turkey in cold water removing anything from the cavity and discard, pat dry with paper towels and place on a large baking tray.
Fold the wings back under the turkey like you would a chicken.
Stuff the cavity with the onion, garlic, lemon thyme and lemon. Use the twine to tie the legs and tail together.
Cover the turkey with oil then season generously. Sprinkle with paprika
Bake in oven for 1 1/2 to 2 hours and turn the turkey every 30 minutes
